Description: Papyrus (incomplete, in four fragments) written with black ink with demotic legal document dated month of Hathyr of year 21 of Ptolemy III Euergetes I. Sale and receipt of land, 5 ll. on recto, list of 16 witnesses on verso. Pasherpamut son of Psamounis sells plot of land to lost male contractor. Scribe Herieus son of Harsiesis.
Bibliographic references: Andrews 1990a / Catalogue of Demotic Papyri in the British Museum IV: Ptolemaic Legal Texts from the Theban Area (p.104-6, pl.89, 92, 94)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (48651) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/48651)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: fragmentary, loss Black ink Supported locally: gelatin Backed: brown paper Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: copydex self adhesive carpet tape Object Priority: B Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: B Curatorial condition comment: fair (incomplete -in 4 pieces with gaps)
